entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:27 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 1:00 PM MST Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -24.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -28.9°C
Wind: E 40 km/h gust 53 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains early this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind light except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind light except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming east 60 km/h gusting to 80 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 March 2023
